name: Heisa Byouin
overview: Heisa Byouin put the player inside somekind of hospital where his character arrives to try to discover the reasons of a serial of murders. As soon as he arrives things starting to go even worse and more people are killed, can you help him solve this horror mystery? The game features good cg graphics for the characters and the building, japanese voice acting and different endings depending of the actions of the player.
